name: sha3-shake256
description: fips202 Sha3 Shake256 hash from buffer or stream.

scripts.build-docs: touch ./readme.md && rm ./readme.md && npx typedoc --toc --excludeNotExported --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --mode modules --theme markdown --out /mnt/d/dev/node-sha3-shake256/docs --readme /mnt/d/dev/node-sha3-shake256/readmeHeader/readhead.md /mnt/d/dev/node-sha3-shake256/src && npx concat-md --toc --decrease-title-levels --dir-name-as-title ./docs > README.md

author: Anthony Ellison
